segments.text: I can’t stop laughing at the boy’s determination to get those cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He’s stretching so far, and the stool is wobbling like crazy.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just standing there, waiting so patiently for her turn.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I notice the woman is completely unaware, just drying that same plate over and over.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is everywhere, and she’s just standing in it like it’s normal.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the boy is going to fall, but he’s so focused on the cookies he doesn’t care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The cookie jar is almost empty, and he’s still grabbing more.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if the girl will catch him if he falls, or if she’ll just grab the cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole scene is so ridiculous, I can’t help but smile.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I see the water spreading, and it’s like no one even notices.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think this is the most chaotic kitchen scene I’ve ever witnessed.
segments.speaker: PAR
